CustomField.description: If checked, either the Lead Account/Company is not owned by a SF RVP/AE and therefore the Lead is assigned outside of the mapping process, or the Account/Company is owned by a SF RVP/AE but the Lead is NOT assigned to the 7S AE/CP who maps to the SF RVP/AE.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, either the Lead Account/Company is not owned by a SF RVP/AE and therefore the Lead is assigned outside of the mapping process, or the Account/Company is owned by a SF RVP/AE but the Lead is NOT assigned to the 7S AE/CP who maps to the SF RVP/A
CustomField.label: Non Channel Assignment
